column2: ITP009-8 - Installation of Shallow Base Canister
column8: ITP009-8 - Installation of Shallow Base Canister

column2: 1.1 - Preparation for the Works to be Undertaken
• Ensure survey set out is undergone, excavation permit obtained and (if required) services in work(s) area isolated.
• Lights, slot cuts, and aiming points marked out.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 008
Acceptance Criteria: Light base cored into pavement and slot from base cut to pavement edge/expansion joint
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 008
Acceptance Criteria: Light base positioned and epoxy poured to secure. Installation of jig.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 008
Acceptance Criteria: Cables ran and connected from new base via joints/slots/conduits to SIT pit.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 008
Acceptance Criteria: Once cables installed, backing rod placed and expansion joints sealed with approved product.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 008
Acceptance Criteria: Gasket positioned on light top, light plugged and positioned to current orientation. Light tested and area cleaned before demobilisation.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 008
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
